name: DungeonQuest (MalosoCreations)
description:
This is a small game I created in my first year of a game development degree for a 2D programming paper, built using C++ and SFML.

I hope you enjoy it.

STORY

In Dungeon Quest, you take control of the protagonist in his search for gold within a dangerous dungeon with nothing but your trusty lantern.

Navigate through multiple levels containing puzzles that you must navigate by pushing boxes out of your way to continue down corridors, collecting keys to open locked doors, while dodging reanimated skeletons and flying skulls.

Each gold coin you collect increases your score by 100 points; collect as many as you can in an attempt to beat your high score.

CONTROLS

Left - Move left
Right - Move right
Up - Move up
Down - Move down
R - Reset player and boxes to start positions
ESC - Quit Game

CREDITS

Art - Dungeon Tileset by Pixel_Poem - https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck
